#summary Explanation for the language files for PRTG

= Translations for PRTG Network Monitor =

PRTG already comes with a set of translations created by Paessler (e.g. English, German). Additionally users can translate the software into other languages. Please note that these translations were not created by Paessler and they are not officially supported by Paessler.

Currently available:

 * Dutch (by Gerard Feijth)

= Installation of Language Files=

Please download the language file that fits your PRTG version from the downloads page:
http://code.google.com/p/prtg7addons/downloads/list

Unzip the file and place it into the /language subfolder of your PRTG installation. Start the PRTG Core Admin Tool and select the desired language from the drop down.
